```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
table_name = hla_II_count$hla[1]
temp <- get(table_name)
temp <- temp[temp$fisher_exact_pvalue < 0.000001,]
sig_pair_II <- temp
sig_pair_II$hla <- hla_II_count$hla[1]
sig_pair_II$hla_count <- hla_II_count$count[1]

for (i in 2:nrow(hla_II_count)){
  table_name <- hla_II_count$hla[i]
  temp <- get(table_name)
  temp <- temp[temp$fisher_exact_pvalue < 0.000001,]
  if (length(temp$count)>0) {
    temp$hla <- hla_II_count$hla[i]
    temp$hla_count <- hla_II_count$count[i]
    sig_pair_II <- rbind(sig_pair_II, temp)
  }
}
rownames(sig_pair_II)=NULL
```

```{r}
sig_pair_II_DePTH <- sig_pair_II[,c(2,1,6)]
```
